name: Goodberry
description: Ten berries appear in your hand and are infused with magic for 24 hours. A creature can take a Bonus Action to eat one berry. Eating a berry restores 1 Hit Point, and the berry provides enough nourishment to sustain a creature for one day. Uneaten berries disappear when the spell ends.

effects.description: Create ten berries that each restore 1 HP and provide a day of nourishment when eaten as a bonus action within 24 hours.
